citations.narrative:
The licensee has moved to a new location. There was no notification to the Agency of the move. The new site is not
covered under the license. A license is issued to specific persons and for approved sites. The licensee must notify Animal
Care at least 90 days prior to a substantial change in business, such as the location of the animals.
Keeping Animal Care informed as to the location of the regulated animals allows for the required unannounced
inspections to ensure compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. Correct by immediately notifying Animal Care of the new
facility location.

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30-11:00 am on
2/28/2023.
End Section

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee has moved to a new location. There was no notification to the Agency of the move. The new site is not 
covered under the license. A license is issued to specific persons and for approved sites. The licensee must notify Animal 
Care at least 90 days prior to a substantial change in business, such as the location of the animals. 
 
Keeping Animal Care informed as to the location of the regulated animals allows for the required unannounced 
inspections to ensure compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. Correct by immediately notifying Animal Care of the new 
facility location. 
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30-11:00 am on 
2/28/2023. 
 
 
 
End Section
